normalized: although there's nothing but blackness in front of me,it feels like… i just had a nostalgic dream.
although it didn't really have a shape or form,something soft felt very fluffy, gentle and nostalgic…
when i opened my eyes, i found myself under the cherrytree in the corner of the schoolyard.
the wind blowingfrom the sea felt refreshing.
a blue clear sky beyond the leaves… it seems i waslying on my back as if i had laid down for a nap.
i stretch and i notice the hard ground under my lowerbody and a nice, soft pillow under my head.
rather than looking at the blue skies or the tree abovehim, ichiro found himself staring at something muchcloser to him.

name: yuko
normalized: flabby is a bit rude, don't you think?
don't saythings which will worry a lady…
saying so, yuko pulls the hem of her cramped gymclothes, seemingly embarrassed.
that small gesture sets the soft bulges above ichiro'shead to sway in a grand fashion.

name: ichiro
normalized: why am i seeing such an extravagant view… ah, i muststill be dreaming…
well, if it's a dream… then i'm going to forget about itsoon anyway.
i might as well enjoy myself while it lasts.

name: ichiro
normalized: well, since it's like that… i'll just go ahead andturn my head around… yuko-sensei's thighs, here i come!

name: yuko
normalized: wake up properly, ichiro… did you take a hit ina bad spot?
it is indeed not a dream.

name: ichiro
normalized: oh lord, she's talking to me like i'm a dog!

my adored yuko-sensei is giving me a lap pillow.

name: ichiro
normalized: good things will probably happen this summer…!
no,wait, maybe this means that all the good things forthis summer have already happened?

name: yuko
normalized: the school nurse said you would be fine if you justrested in the shade, so…
apparently, it wasn't because i was trampled by lily.

name: ichiro
normalized: getting a certain teacher's ball slammed into my facecouldn't have had anything to do with it…

name: yuko
normalized: those things inevitably just happen during games, no?

such a thing must not be allowed to happen!

name: ichiro
normalized: i really am a lucky gu… yy?

name: yuko
normalized: you need to rest for a while longer.

name: ichiro
normalized: （bare legged lap pillow is the best thing ever!

necks aren't used to touching, so they aresensitive…

name: ichiro

even thoughyou would think looking at yuko's face would cause you tobecome aroused, instead it was starting to feel cosy.

name: yuko
normalized: a little longer like this… okay?

normalized: it is so soft… so fluffy…

name: ichiro
normalized: this was under me… my lucky charm.

even during pe classes(well, it was technically homeroom now), ichiro wouldalways keep it with him.

name: ichiro
normalized: not something a man would carry normally, huh.
the brooch had 『leontopodium alpinum』 written on it.
grandmother had left it to ichiro just before passingaway.

name: ichiro
normalized: ah, yeah, i think she said something like that.
originally, the five petals were silver.
but wear andtear had reduced one leaf to black and one to cloudy.

name: ichiro
normalized: i guess it's merely plated, not proper silver…
even so, for ichiro it was an important, priceless gift.

name: ichiro
normalized: she said it would protect me from misfortune and toalways have it with me so… i have.

name: ichiro
normalized: it doesn't seem to work, so maybe i should finally stopcarrying it around…

name: yuko
normalized: i think it's good that you keep it with you.
